text: The payment of benefits under the retirement programs under § 1-626.05(2) and (3) shall be in accordance with the applicable provisions of §§ 401(a) and 457 of the Internal Revenue Code.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-627.12.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.

References in Text

Sections 401(a) and 457 of the Internal Revenue Code referred to in this section are classified as 26 U.S.C. §§ 401(a) and 457, respectively.

DC CODE § 1-626.12

Current through December 11, 2012
